info.name: Rounded Table Corners
info.description:
Gives a nicer look to tables! 

Features:
- Works on Most Sites: works basically everywhere, except on text-editor sites like Google Docs and a few sites I had trouble overriding the CSS of
- Nested Tables (a table within a table): doesn't give the inner table(s) rounded corners
- Table Headers and Footers: doesn't round extra corners when there's a header or footer
- Customizable Colors: change the table colors to whatever you like!
- Customizable Table Radius: change how round the table is!
